Symbol.Script_3D:
resol gs_resol if not(gs_shadow) then shadow off
!addz -wallRefreshOffs ! offsetting whole door due to refreshing problems (e.g. composite layers' changes)
!!!if isWindow then ! ============================================================================= ! GS Corner Window Functions ! =============================================================================
call "LIMA_arc_Corner Window Functions", parameters all iWindowShape = iWindowShape, gs_IsCurved = gs_IsCurved, bParalellInCurvedWalls = bParalellInCurvedWalls, !! lod3D = lod3D, bDisabeMirroring = bDisabeMirroring, !! bLeftCornerFunction = bLeftCornerFunction, !! leftCornerAngle = leftCornerAngle, !! bLeftDiffConnWall = bLeftDiffConnWall, !! leftConnWallThk = leftConnWallThk, !! bRightCornerFunction = bRightCornerFunction, !! rightCornerAngle = rightCornerAngle, !! bRightDiffConnWall = bRightDiffConnWall, !! rightConnWallThk = rightConnWallThk, bEnableVentilationProfile = bEnableVentilationProfile, bEnableParapetInset = bEnableParapetInset, bEnableMasonryArch = bEnableMasonryArch, bEnableFaschen = bEnableFaschen, bEnableThreshold = bEnableThreshold, bEnableCustomCornerLeft = bEnableCustomCornerLeft, bEnableCustomCornerRight = bEnableCustomCornerRight, bForbiddenScaleChangeMoving = 1, returned_parameters ac_unit_width, ac_unit_height, gs_frame_ovhg_left_out, gs_frame_ovhg_right_out, gs_frame_ovhg_top_out, gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_out, gs_frame_ovhg_left_in, gs_frame_ovhg_right_in, gs_frame_ovhg_top_in, gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_in, bMirrored, iDetLevel3D, xform11, xform12, xform13, xform14, xform21, xform22, xform23, xform24, xform31, xform32, xform33, xform34,
bOplines3d, opLineType3dIn, opLineType3dOut, gs_opline_style_m, gs_opLinePen, bShowAddHotspots, bShowAddHotspotsForIS, bShowUnitHotspots !!!else !!! !!! ! ============================================================================= !!! ! GS Door Functions !!! ! ============================================================================= !!! call "GS Door Functions_Siegenia_Titan", !!! parameters all iWindowShape = iWindowShape, !!! bParalellInCurvedWalls = bParalellInCurvedWalls, !!! iOpeningParamType = iOpeningParamType, !!! bDisabeMirroring = bDisabeMirroring, !!! !----------Enable Functions---------------- !!! bEnableParapetInset = bEnableParapetInset, !!! bEnableMasonryArch = bEnableMasonryArch, !!! bEnableSill = bEnableSill, !!! bEnableBoard = bEnableBoard, !!! bEnableFaschen = bEnableFaschen, !!! bEnableThreshold = bEnableThreshold, !!! bEnableCasing = bEnableCasing, !!! bEnableShutter = bEnableShutter, !!! bEnableGanging = bEnableGanging, !!! bEnableVentilationProfile = bEnableVentilationProfile, !!! bForbiddenScaleChangeMoving = bForbiddenScaleChangeMoving, !!! returned_parameters ac_unit_width, ac_unit_height, !!! gs_frame_ovhg_left_out, !!! gs_frame_ovhg_right_out, !!! gs_frame_ovhg_top_out, !!! gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_out, !!! gs_frame_ovhg_left_in, !!! gs_frame_ovhg_right_in, !!! gs_frame_ovhg_top_in, !!! gs_frame_ovhg_bottom_in, !!! gs_frame_wthk, !!! gs_fthk, !!! thresholdModify, !!! bMirrored, !!! iDetLevel3D, !!! xform11, xform12, xform13, xform14, !!! xform21, xform22, xform23, xform24, !!! xform31, xform32, xform33, xform34, !!! !!! bOplines3d, opLineType3dIn, opLineType3dOut, gs_opline_style_m, gs_opLinePen, !!! bShowAddHotspots, bShowAddHotspotsForIS, bShowUnitHotspots, bShowEgressHotspots, bShowLeafHotspots, !!! !!! ! Extra Sizes for Pocket Doors !!! gs_unit_extra_left, !!! gs_unit_extra_right !!!endif
! ============================================================================= ! Block for operator mode ! =============================================================================
if GLOB_CONTEXT > 40 & GLOB_CONTEXT < 50 then prism_ 4, WIDO_FRAME_THICKNESS, -ac_unit_width/2, 0, 15, ac_unit_width/2, 0, 15, ac_unit_width/2, ac_unit_height, 15, -ac_unit_width/2, ac_unit_height, 15 end endif
if bEnableSkinturning then gosub "SkinTurning"
! ============================================================================= ! GeneralWindowUnit Transformations ! =============================================================================
if iTypeDemolitionFill = RENOVATION_FILL_NEW & gs_bShowNewOnCC then end ! New
if iDetLevel3D = DETLEVEL_3D_OFF then end
xform xform11, xform12, xform13, xform14, xform21, xform22, xform23, xform24, xform31, xform32, xform33, xform34 rotx 90
! ============================================================================= ! General Door Unit ! =============================================================================
if gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_SEGMENTAL \ | gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_1L_SEGMENTAL \ then hotspot -A/2, B, 0, UnID,"hOpeningArc", 1 : UnID = UnID+1 hotspot -A/2, B - hOpeningArc, 0, UnID,"hOpeningArc", 2 : UnID = UnID+1 hotspot -A/2, B + 1, 0, UnID,"hOpeningArc", 3 : UnID = UnID+1 if gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_1L_SEGMENTAL then hotspot -A/2, B, 0, UnID,"wOpeningArc", 1 : UnID = UnID+1 hotspot -A/2 + wOpeningArc, B, 0, UnID,"wOpeningArc", 2 : UnID = UnID+1 hotspot -A/2, B, 0, UnID,"wOpeningArc", 3 : UnID = UnID+1 else hotspot A/2, B, 0, UnID,"hOpeningArc", 1 : UnID = UnID+1 hotspot A/2, B - hOpeningArc, 0, UnID,"hOpeningArc", 2 : UnID = UnID+1 hotspot A/2, B + 1, 0, UnID,"hOpeningArc", 3 : UnID = UnID+1 endif endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Frame ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
call "LIMA_arc_Frame" parameters all \ A = ac_unit_width, B = ac_unit_height, iFrameType = iFrameType, iDoublage = iDoublage, isWindow = isWindow, DoublageThk = DoublageThk, bOpenOut = bOpenOut, gs_frame_mat_out = gs_frame_mat_out, gs_frame_mat_in = gs_frame_mat_in, UnID = 100
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Leaf(s) ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
!Tilt and slide extra operation if iDoorType = DOOR_TYPE_TILT_SLIDE then if gs_open_3D_w > EPS then if gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_4L_2SLIDING then LeafPos[2][3] = 0.072 LeafPos[3][3] = 0.072 endif
if gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_2L_1SLIDING then LeafPos[1][3] = 0.072 endif endif endif
for i = 1 to iLeafNum add LeafPos[i][1], LeafPos[i][2], -LeafPos[i][3] ! leaf position's center
call "LIMA_arc_Leaf" parameters all \ A = LeafBox[i][1], B = LeafBox[i][2], OpeningArcHeight = OpeningArcHeight - unitDUpper + leafDUpper, bOpenOut = bOpenOut, iLeafType = iLeafTypeS[i], gs_leaf_thk = gs_leaf_thk, gs_frame_thk = gs_frame_thk, iOpeningType = iOpType[i], iGlassType = iGlassType, hingeOffsX = hingeOffsX, hingeOffsZ = hingeOffsZ, handleOffsX = handleOffsX, handleOffsY = handleOffsY, bShowHandle = bShowHandle, bShowHinge = bShowHinge, gs_leaf_mat_out = gs_leaf_mat_out, gs_leaf_mat_in = gs_leaf_mat_in, gs_glass_mat = gs_glass_mat, UnID = i * 200, bOplines3d = bOplines3d, opLineType3dIn = OpLineType3dIn, opLineType3dOut = OpLineType3dOut, gs_opline_style_m = gs_opline_style_m, gs_opLinePen = gs_OpLinePen, wOpeningArc = wOpeningArc - unitDLeft + leafDLeft, hOpeningArc = hOpeningArc - unitDUpper + leafDUpper next i
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------- end ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Wall end / turned finish skin(s) -------------------------------------------------------------------- "SkinTurning": dyCutSh = 0 !! .0225 * (iShutterBoxType <> SHUTTER_NONE) yCut = gs_frame_thk + dyCutSh dSill = 0 xCutR = ac_reveal_width/2 xCutL = ac_reveal_width/2 pen WALL_SECT_PEN
mulz -1
addz -yCut + dyCutSh
if WALL_SKINS_NUMBER > 1 &\ GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then
FinishSkinNum = 0 FinishSkinThk = 0 if PlacedOnOutside then SkinCheckStart = WALL_SKINS_NUMBER SkinCheckEnd = 1 SkinCheckStep = -1 else SkinCheckStart = 1 SkinCheckEnd = WALL_SKINS_NUMBER SkinCheckStep = 1 endif
for kk = SkinCheckStart to SkinCheckEnd step SkinCheckStep if abs(WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][15] - 1) <EPS then FinishSkinNum = kk FinishSkinThk = FinishSkinThk + WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][2] else kk = SkinCheckEnd endif next kk
if FinishSkinNum > 0 then
add 0, 0, -WALL_THICKNESS
hCutSill = gs_sill_thk * gs_sill_outside ! if not(isWindow) then wallniche 4, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1, WALL_THICKNESS, -xCutL - FinishSkinThk, 0 - hCutSill, 10, -xCutL - FinishSkinThk, ac_reveal_height + FinishSkinThk, 10, xCutR + FinishSkinThk, ac_reveal_height + FinishSkinThk, 10, xCutR + FinishSkinThk, 0 - hCutSill, 10 ! else !! prism_ 4, WALL_THICKNESS, ! wallniche 4, 1, 1, ! 0, 0, 1, WALL_THICKNESS, ! -xCutL - FinishSkinThk, -FinishSkinThk, 10, ! -xCutL - FinishSkinThk, ac_reveal_height + FinishSkinThk, 10, ! xCutR + FinishSkinThk, ac_reveal_height + FinishSkinThk, 10, ! xCutR + FinishSkinThk, -FinishSkinThk, 10 ! endif
if PlacedOnOutside then SkinLinePenInd2 = 9 else SkinLinePenInd2 = 7 endif SkinCheckEnd = FinishSkinNum skinThkAct = 0
pen WALL_VIEW_PEN
if bNeedOpDirMig exor not(WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE) then material WALL_MAT_B else material WALL_MAT_A endif
for kk = SkinCheckStart to SkinCheckEnd step SkinCheckStep skinFill = WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][1] skinPen = WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][4] skinBckgPen = WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][5] skinThk = WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][2]
sect_fill skinFill, skinBckgPen, skinPen, WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][SkinLinePenInd2]
addz gs_frame_thk + skinThkAct
if ((kk < SkinCheckEnd) & not(PlacedOnOutside)) |\ ((kk > SkinCheckEnd) & PlacedOnOutside) then
! if not(isWindow) then prism_ 8, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk - skinThkAct - dyCutSh, -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, 0, 14, -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, 0, 14,
xCutR + skinThkAct, 0, 15, xCutR + skinThkAct, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct, 15, -xCutL - skinThkAct, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct, 15, -xCutL - skinThkAct, 0, 15
prism_ 8, skinThk, -xCutL - FinishSkinThk, hCutSill, 14, -xCutL - FinishSkinThk, ac_reveal_height + FinishSkinThk, 14, xCutR + FinishSkinThk, ac_reveal_height + FinishSkinThk, 14, xCutR + FinishSkinThk, hCutSill, 14,
xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, 0, 14, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, 0, 14
! else ! ! prism_ 10, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk - skinThkAct, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, - skinThkAct - skinThk, 14, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, ! xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, ! xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, - skinThkAct - skinThk, 14, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, - skinThkAct - skinThk, -1, ! ! -xCutL - skinThkAct, - skinThkAct, 15, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct, 15, ! xCutR + skinThkAct, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct, 15, ! xCutR + skinThkAct, - skinThkAct, 15, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct, - skinThkAct, -1 ! ! prism_ 10, skinThk, ! -xCutL - FinishSkinThk, - FinishSkinThk, 14, ! -xCutL - FinishSkinThk, ac_reveal_height + FinishSkinThk, 14, ! xCutR + FinishSkinThk, ac_reveal_height + FinishSkinThk, 14, ! xCutR + FinishSkinThk, - FinishSkinThk, 14, ! -xCutL - FinishSkinThk, - FinishSkinThk, -1, ! ! -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, - skinThkAct - skinThk, 14, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, ! xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, ! xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, - skinThkAct - skinThk, 14, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, - skinThkAct - skinThk, -1 ! endif else
! if not(isWindow) then prism_ 8, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk - skinThkAct - dyCutSh, -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, -hCutSill, 14, -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, -hCutSill, 14,
xCutR + skinThkAct, -hCutSill, 15, xCutR + skinThkAct, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct, 15, -xCutL - skinThkAct, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct, 15, -xCutL - skinThkAct, -hCutSill, 15 ! else ! prism_ 10, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk - skinThkAct, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, - skinThkAct - skinThk, 14, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, ! xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct + skinThk, 14, ! xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, - skinThkAct - skinThk, 14, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct - skinThk, - skinThkAct - skinThk, -1, ! ! -xCutL - skinThkAct, - skinThkAct, 15, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct, 15, ! xCutR + skinThkAct, ac_reveal_height + skinThkAct, 15, ! xCutR + skinThkAct, - skinThkAct, 15, ! -xCutL - skinThkAct, - skinThkAct, -1 ! endif
endif
del 1
skinThkAct = skinThkAct + WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][2] next kk
del 1
if TurnedSkinCutNum then for jj = 1 to TurnedSkinCutNum cutend next jj endif
endif
endif
del 1 del 1 return
Symbol.Script_2D:
!hotspot2 0,0 : circle2 0,0, 0.01 : line2 0,0, 1,0 : line2 0,0, 0,0.5
!add2 0, wallRefreshOffs ! offsetting whole door due to refreshing problems (e.g. composite layers' changes)
!!if isWindow then ! ============================================================================= ! GS Corner Window Functions ! =============================================================================
call "LIMA_arc_Corner Window Functions", parameters all iWindowShape = iWindowShape, gs_IsCurved = gs_IsCurved, bParalellInCurvedWalls = bParalellInCurvedWalls, bDisabeMirroring = bDisabeMirroring, !! bLeftCornerFunction = bLeftCornerFunction, !! leftCornerAngle = leftCornerAngle, !! bLeftDiffConnWall = bLeftDiffConnWall, !! leftConnWallThk = leftConnWallThk, !! bRightCornerFunction = bRightCornerFunction, !! rightCornerAngle = rightCornerAngle, !! bRightDiffConnWall = bRightDiffConnWall, !! rightConnWallThk = rightConnWallThk, gs_RevealTypeEnable = gs_RevealTypeEnable, bEnableParapetInset = bEnableParapetInset, bEnableMasonryArch = bEnableMasonryArch, bEnableFaschen = bEnableFaschen, bEnableThreshold = bEnableThreshold, bEnableCustomCornerLeft = bEnableCustomCornerLeft, bEnableCustomCornerRight = bEnableCustomCornerRight, bForbiddenScaleChangeMoving = bForbiddenScaleChangeMoving, returned_parameters ac_unit_width, gs_frame_ovhg_left_out, gs_frame_ovhg_right_out, gs_frame_ovhg_left_in, gs_frame_ovhg_right_in, bMirrored, addPrmX, addPrmY, mulPrmX, mulPrmY, iLoD2D, iDetLevel2D, gs_opLinePen, gs_iSwingType, gs_iSlidingType, gs_swingLineType, bShowAddHotspots, bShowUnitHotspots, bOneLineSymbolin2D !!else !! ! ============================================================================= !! ! GS Door Functions !! ! ============================================================================= !! call "GS Door Functions_Siegenia_Titan", !! parameters all iWindowShape = iWindowShape, !! bParalellInCurvedWalls = bParalellInCurvedWalls, !! iOpeningParamType = iOpeningParamType, !! bDisabeMirroring = bDisabeMirroring, !! !----------Enable Functions---------------- !! bEnableParapetInset = bEnableParapetInset, !! bEnableMasonryArch = bEnableMasonryArch, !! bEnableSill = bEnableSill, !! bEnableBoard = bEnableBoard, !! bEnableFaschen = bEnableFaschen, !! bEnableThreshold = bEnableThreshold, !! bEnableCasing = bEnableCasing, !! bEnableShutter = bEnableShutter, !! bEnableGanging = bEnableGanging, !! bForbiddenScaleChangeMoving = bForbiddenScaleChangeMoving, !! returned_parameters ac_unit_width, !! gs_frame_ovhg_left_out, !! gs_frame_ovhg_right_out, !! gs_frame_ovhg_left_in, !! gs_frame_ovhg_right_in, !! gs_frame_wthk, !! gs_fthk, !! bMirrored, !! addPrmX, addPrmY, !! mulPrmX, mulPrmY, !! iLoD2D, !! iDetLevel2D, !! bSimpleLeafin50, !! gs_opLinePen, !! gs_iSwingType, !! gs_iSlidingType, !! gs_swingLineType, !! bShowAddHotspots, bShowUnitHotspots, bShowEgressHotspots, bShowLeafHotspots, !! !! ! Extra Sizes for Pocket Doors !! gs_unit_extra_left, !! gs_unit_extra_right !!endif
if iDetLevel2D = DETLEVEL_2D_OFF then end
add2 addPrmX, addPrmY mul2 mulPrmX, mulPrmY
!if iTypeDemolitionFill = RENOVATION_FILL_DEMOLISHED then gs_swingLineType = gs_Demolition_linetype ! Demolition !if iTypeDemolitionFill = RENOVATION_FILL_NEW & gs_bShowNewOnCC then end ! New
if bEnableSkinturning then gosub "SkinTurning"
! ============================================================================= ! GeneralWindowUnit ! ============================================================================= ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Frame ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
call "LIMA_arc_Frame" parameters all \ A = ac_unit_width, iFrameType = iFrameType, ! iDoublage = iDoublage, isWindow = isWindow, ! DoublageThk = DoublageThk, bOpenOut = bOpenOut, UnID = 100
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Leaf ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
!Tilt and slide extra operation if iDoorType = DOOR_TYPE_TILT_SLIDE then if gs_open_2D_w > EPS then if gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_4L_2SLIDING then LeafPos[2][3] = 0.072 LeafPos[3][3] = 0.072 endif
if gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_2L_1SLIDING then LeafPos[1][3] = 0.072 endif endif endif
if gs_iSwingType <> 3 then ! Opening Axis Line gosub "CalculationLeafSizePos" ! there might be overwritten ac_unit_width
bShowHandle = 1 bShowHinge = 1
for i = 1 to iLeafNum add2 LeafPos[i][1], LeafPos[i][3] ! leaf position's center
call "LIMA_arc_Leaf" parameters all \ A = LeafBox[i][1], bOpenOut = bOpenOut, iLeafType = iLeafTypeS[i], gs_leaf_thk = gs_leaf_thk, gs_frame_thk = gs_frame_thk, iOpeningType = iOpType[i], LeafPosZ = LeafPos[i][3], hingeOffsX = hingeOffsX, hingeOffsZ = hingeOffsZ, bShowHandle = bShowHandle, bShowHinge = bShowHinge, UnID = i * 200, gs_opLinePen = gs_opLinePen, gs_iSwingType = gs_iSwingType, gs_iSlidingType = gs_iSlidingType, gs_swingLineType = gs_swingLineType del 1 next i else pen gs_opLinePen line_type gs_swingLineType
line2 0, -gs_frame_thk/2 + 0.5, 0, -gs_frame_thk/2 - 0.5 endif
! --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------- end ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Wall end / turned finish skin(s) -------------------------------------------------------------------- "SkinTurning":
if not(WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE) then mul2 1,-1 add2 0, gs_frame_thk endif
mul2 1, 1 ADD2 0, 0 yCut = gs_frame_thk
dSill = 0 xCutR = ac_reveal_width/2 pen WALL_SECT_PEN
fill gs_wallhole_fill
for i = 1 to 2 bIsWallCutSide = 1 if i = 1 then if abs(gs_right_oversize) > eps then bIsWallCutSide = 0 else if abs(gs_left_oversize) > eps then bIsWallCutSide = 0 endif
if bIsWallCutSide then
! Wall end / turned finish skin(s) --------------------------------------------------------------------
if WALL_SKINS_NUMBER > 1 then FinishSkinNum = 0 FinishSkinThk = 0 if PlacedOnOutside then SkinCheckStart = WALL_SKINS_NUMBER SkinCheckEnd = 1 SkinCheckStep = -1 else SkinCheckStart = 1 SkinCheckEnd = WALL_SKINS_NUMBER SkinCheckStep = 1 endif
for kk = SkinCheckStart to SkinCheckEnd step SkinCheckStep if abs(WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][15] - 1) <EPS then FinishSkinNum = kk FinishSkinThk = FinishSkinThk + WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][2] else kk = SkinCheckEnd endif next kk
if FinishSkinNum > 0 then
add2 0, -WALL_THICKNESS !* PlacedOnOutside
wallhole2 4, 32, gs_wallhole_pen_fg, gs_wallhole_pen_bg, 0, 0, 0, ! poly2_b 4, 7, 6, 10, xCutR, 0, 0, xCutR + FinishSkinThk, 0, 0, xCutR + FinishSkinThk, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk, 0, xCutR, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk, 0
if PlacedOnOutside then SkinLineTypeInd1= 8 SkinLinePenInd1 = 7 SkinLineTypeInd2= 10 SkinLinePenInd2 = 9 else SkinLineTypeInd1= 10 SkinLinePenInd1 = 9 SkinLineTypeInd2= 8 SkinLinePenInd2 = 7 endif SkinCheckEnd = FinishSkinNum skinThkAct = 0
for kk = SkinCheckStart to SkinCheckEnd step SkinCheckStep skinFill = WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][1] skinPen = WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][4] skinBckgPen = WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][5] skinThk = WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][2]
fill skinFill if ((kk < SkinCheckEnd) & not(PlacedOnOutside)) |\ ((kk > SkinCheckEnd) & PlacedOnOutside) then wallblock2 6, 7, skinPen, skinBckgPen, 0, 0, 0, ! poly2_b 6, 7, 12, 5, xCutR + skinThkAct, skinThkAct, 1, xCutR + skinThkAct + FinishSkinThk, skinThkAct, 1, xCutR + skinThkAct + FinishSkinThk, skinThkAct + skinThk, 1, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, skinThkAct + skinThk, 1, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk, 1, xCutR + skinThkAct, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk, 1
line_type WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][SkinLineTypeInd1] pen WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][SkinLinePenInd1] wallline2 xCutR + skinThkAct + FinishSkinThk, skinThkAct + skinThk, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, skinThkAct + skinThk wallline2 xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, skinThkAct + skinThk, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk
line_type WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][SkinLineTypeInd2] pen WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][SkinLinePenInd2] wallline2 xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk, xCutR + skinThkAct, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk wallline2 xCutR + skinThkAct, skinThkAct, xCutR + skinThkAct + FinishSkinThk, skinThkAct wallline2 xCutR + skinThkAct, skinThkAct, xCutR + skinThkAct, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk else wallblock2 5, 7, skinPen, skinBckgPen, 0, 0, 0, ! poly2_b 5, 7, 8, 7, xCutR + skinThkAct, skinThkAct, 1, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, skinThkAct, 1, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, skinThkAct + skinThk, 1, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk, 1, xCutR + skinThkAct, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk, 1
line_type WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][SkinLineTypeInd1] pen WALL_SKINS_PARAMS[kk][SkinLinePenInd1] wallline2 xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, skinThkAct + skinThk, xCutR + skinThkAct + skinThk, WALL_THICKNESS - gs_frame_thk

! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- "ProductParameters": ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! ============================================================================== ! ! UI Scrolling ! ! ==============================================================================
xPos = 5 wText = 444 - 14 - xPos ! hText = 15 !defined in master ! yStart = 60 !defined in master y0 = 30 hScrollbuttons = 50
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!text scrolling
hScrollBar = hTextArea - 2 * hScrollbuttons nLines = vardim1(sLines)
if nLines > nLinesPerUIPage then iUITop = hScrollBar * ((iScrollPos - 1) / nLines) iUIMid = hScrollBar * (nLinesPerUIPage / nLines) iUIBot = hScrollBar * ((iScrollPos + nLinesPerUIPage) / nLines)
if iScrollPos > 1 then sUIst = "ui_scroll_top" else sUIst = "ui_scroll_top_lock" if iScrollPos > 1 then sUIfi = "ui_scroll_first" else sUIfi = "ui_scroll_first_lock" if iScrollPos > 1 then sUIup = "ui_scroll_up" else sUIup = "ui_scroll_up_lock"
if iScrollPos < vardim1(sLines) - nLinesPerUIPage + 1 then sUIdw = "ui_scroll_down" else sUIdw = "ui_scroll_down_lock" if iScrollPos < vardim1(sLines) - nLinesPerUIPage + 1 then sUIla = "ui_scroll_last" else sUIla = "ui_scroll_last_lock" if iScrollPos < vardim1(sLines) - nLinesPerUIPage + 1 then sUIbo = "ui_scroll_bottom" else sUIbo = "ui_scroll_bottom_lock"
UI_PICT_BUTTON UI_FUNCTION, ``, sUIst, 444 - 5 - 10, y0 + 15, 15, 15, BUTTON_ID + 1 ui_tooltip "Move up to the top" UI_PICT_BUTTON UI_FUNCTION, ``, sUIfi, 444 - 5 - 10, y0 + 30, 15, 15, BUTTON_ID + iScrollPos - nLinesPerUIPage ui_tooltip "Move up one page" UI_PICT_BUTTON UI_FUNCTION, ``, sUIup, 444 - 5 - 10, y0 + 45, 15, 15, BUTTON_ID + iScrollPos - 1 ui_tooltip "Move up by one row"
ui_separator 444 - 8, y0 + 65, 444 - 8, y0 + 65 + iUITop ui_separator 444 - 8, y0 + 65 + iUIBot, 444 - 8, y0 + 65 + hScrollbar ui_separator 444 - 11, y0 + 65 + iUITop, 444 - 3, y0 + 65 + iUIBot
UI_PICT_BUTTON UI_FUNCTION, ``, sUIdw, 444 - 5 - 10, 266 - 60, 15, 15, BUTTON_ID + iScrollPos + 1 ui_tooltip "Move down by one row" UI_PICT_BUTTON UI_FUNCTION, ``, sUIla, 444 - 5 - 10, 266 - 45, 15, 15, BUTTON_ID + iScrollPos + nLinesPerUIPage ui_tooltip "Move down one page" UI_PICT_BUTTON UI_FUNCTION, ``, sUIbo, 444 - 5 - 10, 266 - 30, 15, 15, BUTTON_ID + nLines - nLinesPerUIPage + 1 ui_tooltip "Move to the bottom" endif
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
for i = 0 to min (nLinesPerUIPage - 1, vardim1(sLines) - 1) ui_style iLineStyles [i + iScrollPos][1], iLineStyles [i + iScrollPos][2] UI_OUTFIELD sLines[i + iScrollPos], xPos, yStart + i * hText, wText, hText,iLineStyles [i + iScrollPos][3] next i
return

! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Version Control ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ parameters iVersionNumber = iVersionNumber
! ============================================================================= ! Set Default BO-parameters ! ============================================================================= if bSetBOdefault then sDefProdatURL = "" ! if iProduct = PRODUCT_xxxxx then sDefProdatURL = "bimobject.com/xxxxx" ! if iProduct = PRODUCT_yyyyy then sDefProdatURL = "bimobject.com/yyyyy"
if sDefProdatURL <> "" then parameters \ BO_prodaturl = sDefProdatURL, BO_edinum = -1, BO_productguid = "" endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Reset stuff only to be uncommented during development ! =============================================================================
!_color = 1 !To drive important pens together !for i = 1 to vardim1(pfills) ! for j = 1 to vardim2(pfills) ! pfills [i][j] = 1 ! next j !pfills [1][1] = 19 !pfills [1][2] = 19 ! !pfills [7][1] = 19 !pfills [8][1] = 19 !pfills [9][1] = 19 !pfills [10][1] = 19 !pfills [11][1] = 19 ! !pfills [7][2] = 19 !pfills [8][2] = 19 !pfills [9][2] = 19 !pfills [10][2] = 19 ! !pfills [9][FP_CONTPEN] = _color !pfills [10][FP_CONTPEN] = _color !pFillS[FILL_FRAME][FP_CONTPEN] = _color ! !fFills [1] = 65 !fFills [7] = 65 !fFills [8] = 65 !fFills [9] = 65 !fFills [10] = 65 !fFills [11] = 65 ! !lFills [i] = 1 ! !next i !parameters pfills = pfills, ! fFills = fFills, ! fFills = fFills ! !for i = 1 to vardim1(materialS) ! materialS [i] = 1 !next i !materialS [MAT_OUT] = 17 !materialS [MAT_HANDLE] = 11 !materialS [MAT_SASH_OUT] = 17 !parameters materialS = materialS !parameters or_iOpLinePen = _color, ! gs_frame_pen = _color, ! gs_leaf_pen = _color, ! gs_glass_pen = _color
! ============================================================================= ! Dimension Limitations ! ============================================================================= wSashMin = 670 wSashMin2= 0 wSashMax = 1200 hSashMin = 840 hSashMax = 2360
dim sAdditionalText[] _i = 0
if gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_1L_SIDE_HUNG then wSashMin = 721 !mm wSashMax = 1650 hSashMin = 310 hSashMax = 3000
values "zHandle" range [min(hSashMin * 0.4 / 1000, 0.300), B - min(hSashMin * 0.4 / 1000, 0.300)] endif
if gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_2L_SIDE_HUNG then wSashMin = 230 !mm wSashMax = 1650 wSashMin2 = 721 !mm hSashMin = 310 hSashMax = 3000
values "zHandle" range [min(hSashMin * 0.4 / 1000, 0.300), B - min(hSashMin * 0.4 / 1000, 0.300)] endif
if gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_SEGMENTAL then wSashMin = 420 !mm wSashMax = 1650 hSashMin = 715 hSashMax = 2360 hArchStartMin = 715 hArchStartMax = 2360
values "zHandle" range [min(hArchStartMin * 0.4 / 1000, 0.300), min(hArchStartMax * 0.4 / 1000, B - hArchStartMin * 0.4 / 1000)] endif
if gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_3L_SIDE_HUNG then wSashMin = 360 !mm wSashMax = 1650 wSashMin2 = 721 !mm hSashMin = 430 hSashMax = 3000
values "zHandle" range [min(hSashMin * 0.4 / 1000, 0.300), B - min(hSashMin * 0.4 / 1000, 0.300)]
xTransomPos1 = -ac_unit_width/2 + unitDLeft - leafDLeft + wSashMin2 /1000 + unitDRight - leafDRight xTransomPos2 = ac_unit_width/2 - unitDLeft + leafDLeft - (wSashMax + wSashMax) /1000 - unitDRight + leafDRight xTransomPosLeft = max (xTransomPos1, xTransomPos2)
xTransomPos3 = -ac_unit_width/2 + unitDLeft - leafDLeft + wSashMax /1000 + unitDRight - leafDRight xTransompos4 = ac_unit_width/2 - unitDLeft + leafDLeft - (wSashMin + wSashMin2) /1000 - unitDRight + leafDRight xTransomPosRight = min (xTransomPos3, xTransomPos4)
if xTransomPosLeft < xTransomPosRight then values "xTransom" range [xTransomPosLeft, xTransomPosRight] else values "xTransom" range [xTransomPosRight, xTransomPosLeft] !Shouldn't be here endif endif
wMin = wSashMin / 1000 wMax = wSashMax / 1000
hMin = hSashMin / 1000 + unitDUpper -leafDUpper + unitDLower - leafDLower hMax = hSashMax / 1000 + unitDUpper -leafDUpper + unitDLower - leafDLower
iDimLimitations = DIMLIM_RANGE
minLeafWidth = wMin minLeafWidth2 = wSashMin2 / 1000 minUnitHeight = hMin maxLeafWidth = wMax maxUnitHeight = hMax
! ---- LIMA ---- values "wOpeningArc" range (0, A - unitDRight) values "hOpeningArc" range (wOpeningArc, B - unitDLower) values "yMullionS" range (unitDLower - B/2, B/2 - unitDUpper) values "hMullionS" range (0, )
dim _mullValS[] for _i = 0 to vardim1(yMullionS) _mullValS[_i+1]= _i next _i
values "iDeleteMullion" _mullVals
if bAddMullion then new~ = vardim1(yMullionS) + 1 yMullionS[new~] = yMullionS[new~-1] + hMullionS[new~-1] hMullionS[new~] = hMullionS[new~-1] sMullionS[new~] = sMullionS[new~-1]
parameters yMullionS = yMullionS, hMullionS = hMullionS, sMullionS = sMullionS, bAddMullion = 0 endif
if iDeleteMullion then dim yMullionSNew[] dim hMullionSNew[] dim sMullionSNew[]
for _i = vardim1(yMullionS)-1 to 1 step -1 if _i >= iDeleteMullion then _j = _i + 1 else _j = _i
yMullionSNew[_i] = yMullionS[_j] hMullionSNew[_i] = hMullionS[_j] sMullionSNew[_i] = sMullionS[_j] next _i
parameters \ yMullionS = yMullionSNew, hMullionS = hMullionSNew, sMullionS = sMullionSNew, iDeleteMullion = 0 endif

iDoorType = iDoorType, gs_leaf_optype_m = gs_leaf_optype_m, LeafOH = LeafOH, leafDLeft = leafDLeft, leafDRight = leafDRight, unitDLeft = unitDLeft, unitDRight = unitDRight, gs_leaf_overlap = gs_leaf_overlap, maxLeafWidth = maxLeafWidth, minLeafWidth = minLeafWidth, minLeafWidth2 = minLeafWidth2
!!else !! ! ============================================================================= !! ! GS Door Functions !! ! ============================================================================= !!!! call "GS Door Functions_Siegenia_Titan", !!!! parameters all iWindowShape = iWindowShape, !!!! bParalellInCurvedWalls = bParalellInCurvedWalls, !!!! iOpeningParamType = iOpeningParamType, !!!! bDisabeMirroring = bDisabeMirroring, !!!! !----------Unit Height---------------- !!!! minUnitWidth = minUnitWidth, !!!! minUnitHeight = minUnitHeight, !!!! maxUnitWidth = maxUnitWidth, !!!! maxUnitHeight = maxUnitHeight, !!!! unitWidthArr = unitWidthArr, !!!! unitHeightArr = unitHeightArr, !!!! iDimLimitations = iDimLimitations, !!!! !----------Dimension Link---------------- !!!! leafDLeft = leafDLeft, !!!! leafDRight = leafDRight, !!!! leafDUpper = leafDUpper, !!!! leafDLower = leafDLower, !!!! unitDLeft = unitDLeft, !!!! unitDRight = unitDRight, !!!! unitDUpper = unitDUpper, !!!! unitDLower = unitDLower, !!!! !----------Enable Functions---------------- !!!! bEnableParapetInset = bEnableParapetInset, !!!! bEnableMasonryArch = bEnableMasonryArch, !!!! bEnableSill = bEnableSill, !!!! bEnableBoard = bEnableBoard, !!!! bEnableFaschen = bEnableFaschen, !!!! bEnableThreshold = bEnableThreshold, !!!! bEnableCasing = bEnableCasing, !!!! bEnableShutter = bEnableShutter, !!!! bEnableGanging = bEnableGanging, !!!! !----------Type Enabling---------------- !!!! gs_RevealTypeEnable = gs_RevealTypeEnable, !!!! gs_ClosureTypeEnable = gs_ClosureTypeEnable, !!!! gs_SillTypeEnable = gs_SillTypeEnable, !!!! gs_CasingOutTypeEnable = gs_CasingOutTypeEnable, !!!! gs_CasingInTypeEnable = gs_CasingInTypeEnable, !!!! gs_TresholdTypeEnable = gs_TresholdTypeEnable, !!!! bForbiddenScaleChangeMoving = bForbiddenScaleChangeMoving, !!!! !!!!! iDoorType = iDoorType, !!!! gs_leaf_optype_m = gs_leaf_optype_m, !!!! LeafOH = LeafOH, !!!! leafDLeftOrig = leafDLeftOrig, !!!! leafDRightOrig = leafDRightOrig, !!!! unitDLeftOrig = unitDLeftOrig, !!!! unitDRightOrig = unitDRightOrig, !!!! gs_leaf_overlap = gs_leaf_overlap, !!!! maxLeafWidth = maxLeafWidth, !!!! minLeafWidth = minLeafWidth !!endif

! ============================================================================= ! Minimal Space ! =============================================================================
if (GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_leaf_optype_m" &\ (gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_1L_DOUBLE_ACTING |\ gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_1L_DOUBLE_ACTING_M |\ gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_2L_DOUBLE_ACTING |\ gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_2L_DOUBLE_EGRESS |\ gs_leaf_optype_m = LEAF_2L_DOUBLE_EGRESS_M )) then
ms_oppositeSDepth = ms_openingSDepth parameters ms_oppositeSDepth = ms_oppositeSDepth endif

dim uiPageIDs[] i = 0 i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_NominalSizes if iUiID_Product then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_Product endif if iUiID_OpLines then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_OpLines endif if iUiID_DoorSettOpModAttr then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_DoorSettOpModAttr endif if iUiID_WinSettOpModAttr then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_WinSettOpModAttr endif ! Wall Opening group i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_WallOpening i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_Reveal i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_Closure if bEnableParapetInset then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_WallInset endif if (gs_sidelight_left | gs_sidelight_right) & not(isWindow) then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_Tolerances endif if bEnableMasonryArch then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_MasonryArch i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_WallOpModelAttr endif ! Fixtures and Fittings group i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_FixtureFitting if bEnableThreshold | bForceToShowThresholdUI then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_Threshold endif if bEnableCasing then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_CasingOut i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_CasingIn endif if bEnableSill then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_Sill endif if bEnableBoard then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_Board endif if bEnableShutter then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_Shutter endif i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_FixFittingModAttr ! Additional independent pages i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_FloorPlanSection if not(isWindow) then i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_MinSpace endif i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_Descriptions ! BO parameters i = i + 1: uiPageIDs[i] = iUiID_BO
values "gs_ui_current_page" uiPageIDs
!----------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Pen/material array <-> conventional parameters !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_frame_mat" \ | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_glass_mat" \ | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_handle_mat" \ | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_threshold_mat" \ | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_frame_mat_out" \ | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_frame_mat_in" \ | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_sash_mat_out" \ | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_sash_mat_in" \ | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_leaf_mat_out" \ | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_leaf_mat_in" \ then if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_frame_mat" then materialS[MAT_IN] = gs_frame_mat if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_frame_mat" then materialS[MAT_OUT] = gs_frame_mat if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_frame_mat_in" then materialS[MAT_IN] = gs_frame_mat_in if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_frame_mat_out" then materialS[MAT_OUT] = gs_frame_mat_out if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_glass_mat" then materialS[MAT_GLASS] = gs_glass_mat if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_handle_mat" then materialS[MAT_HANDLE] = gs_handle_mat if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_threshold_mat" then materialS[MAT_THRESHOLD] = gs_threshold_mat if bOpenOut then if isWindow then if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_sash_mat_out" then materialS[MAT_SASH_IN] = gs_sash_mat_out if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_sash_mat_in" then materialS[MAT_SASH_OUT] = gs_sash_mat_in else if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_leaf_mat_in" then materialS[MAT_SASH_OUT] = gs_leaf_mat_in if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_leaf_mat_out" then materialS[MAT_SASH_IN] = gs_leaf_mat_out endif else if isWindow then if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_sash_mat_out" then materialS[MAT_SASH_OUT] = gs_sash_mat_out if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_sash_mat_in" then materialS[MAT_SASH_IN] = gs_sash_mat_in else if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_leaf_mat_in" then materialS[MAT_SASH_IN] = gs_leaf_mat_in if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_leaf_mat_out" then materialS[MAT_SASH_OUT] = gs_leaf_mat_out endif endif
parameters materialS = materialS else gs_frame_mat_in = materialS[MAT_IN] gs_frame_mat_out = materialS[MAT_OUT] gs_glass_mat = materialS[MAT_GLASS] gs_handle_mat = materialS[MAT_HANDLE] gs_threshold_mat = materialS[MAT_THRESHOLD] if bOpenOut then if isWindow then gs_sash_mat_out = materialS[MAT_SASH_IN] gs_sash_mat_in = materialS[MAT_SASH_OUT] else gs_leaf_mat_out = materialS[MAT_SASH_IN] gs_leaf_mat_in = materialS[MAT_SASH_OUT] endif else if isWindow then gs_sash_mat_out = materialS[MAT_SASH_OUT] gs_sash_mat_in = materialS[MAT_SASH_IN] else gs_leaf_mat_out = materialS[MAT_SASH_OUT] gs_leaf_mat_in = materialS[MAT_SASH_IN] endif endif
parameters materialS = materialS endif
